nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Comparing data with the Compare Datasets node

The [Compare Datasets]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} node compares data streams before merging them. It outputs up to four different branches.

Click the **Execute Workflow** button, then double click on the nodes to see the input and output items.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Explore outputs 

In the OUTPUT panel of this node, click on the different tabs to see which data goes to which output stream.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Manualtrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Manualtrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 4 different services: stickyNote, manualTrigger, compareDatasets, code. It contains 6 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 6
- **Node Types**: 4
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking "Execute Workflow"**: manualTrigger
- **Dataset 1**: code
- **Dataset 2**: code
- **Compare Datasets**: compareDatasets
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
